name: L.O.R.
description:
Do you want a new, more creative, and original match three game? Do you love puzzle games? Do you want a game that has transcended beyond confusing and frustrating levelling systems?

Kids love LOR! Adults love LOR! Even curmudgeons and miserly old hermits and that live in dank caves…

…love this game called LOR!

Download LOR now!

The creators of Wordz, the extremely addictive word hunt game, have done it again! They have reinvented the match three game in a creative and exciting way!

LOR is a new, fun, and cool match three game that goes way above and beyond what you might expect from any other match three game!

LOR is a game of matching and strategy! In this match three you can compete with millions of other player every day, devise your strategy, and attempt to dominate the Top Players list!

LOR has awesome hand drawn HD graphics that are superbly used to accent the sweet in-game effects and animation! The sounds and music are amazing and add a well-crafted dimension to the game. The game play is simple yet highly addictive and challenging. Take on your friends! Take on your mobile game lovin’ family members! Challenging everyone to an exciting round of LOR by simply downloading now!

LOR FEATURES:

-Fun game
-Sweet graphics
-Amazing effects
-Excellent game play
-Awesome user experience
-Unique and highly addictive match three
-Perfect for match three gamers of all ages
-Professionally developed and expertly created game

LOR is a professionally developed and expertly created game that has been imagined and designed to bring you the best match three gaming experience that we know of in app stores anywhere! The FUGO experts have taken an old favorite and made it a whole new experience that you and your gaming buddies will want to play again and again! To explore the LOR all you need to do is simply download LOR now!
publishers: FUGO BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI VE YAZILIM TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
